Home » 39P3 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3) » 2 Hetugocchaka, Kusalattika » 2.5 Hetuhetusampayuttaduka, Kusalattika » 2.5.1 Kusalapada » 2.5.1.1--6 Paṭiccādivāra » Paccayacatukka
Hetu
Hetugocchaka, Kusalattika
Hetuhetusampayuttaduka, Kusalattika
Kusalapada
Paṭiccādivāra
Paccayacatukka
Hetu
71.
1407Hetuñceva hetusampayuttañca kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu ceva hetusampayutto ca kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuñceva hetusampayuttañca kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetusampayutto ceva na ca hetu kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
72.
1408Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava…pe…  avigate nava. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
